original_text: And all the people gathered as one man into the square before the Water Gate. And they told Ezra the scribe to bring the Book of the Law of Moses that the Lord had commanded Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 자기들의 성읍에 거주하였더니 일곱째 달에 이르러 모든 백성이 일제히 수문 앞 광장에 모여 학사 에스라에게 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 명령하신 모세의 율법책을 가져오기를 청하매

sentences.original_text: And all the people gathered as one man
into the square before the Water Gate.
And they told Ezra the scribe
to bring the Book of the Law of Moses
that the Lord had commanded Israel.
